front.title: Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS)Traffic Engineering Management Information Base

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of theManagement Information Base (MIB) for use with networkmanagement protocols in the Internet community. Inparticular, it describes managed objects forMultiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) [RFC3031] andGeneralized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS)[GMPLSArch] based traffic engineering.
